title: Dhammika Prasad on a satyagraha for justice for easter victims
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former cricketer Dhammika Prasad has initiated a satyagraha at the Galle Face protest ground this morning (15), in hopes of ensuring justice for the victims of the Easter attack.
Participating in the Sathyagraha, Prasad said that he initiated this action in hope that the people would get justice at a time when they are in a helpless situation.
Dhammika Prasad on a satyagraha for justice for easter victims
Fuel limit imposed for cars, vans, suv, motorcycles, & three-wheeler
